head.title: Generate QR codes for {{FileFormatUp}} files using {{ProgLang}}
head.description: Use the {{ProdShortName}} API to generate and embed QR codes in {{FileFormatUp}} files. Easily place QR codes on any page to add extra functionality.

header.title: Generate QR codes for {{FileFormatUp}}
header.description: Effortlessly create 2D barcodes using text or numeric data and apply them to various pages and formats, including PDFs, Word, Excel, and more with {{ProdFullName}}.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Explore the features of {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) offers a wide range of capabilities, enabling users to generate and embed different signature types across major document formats. Whether it's PDFs, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, or images, enhance your documents with Text, Image, Barcode, QR Code, Metadata, Digital, or Stamp signatures.

more_features.title: Complete signature integration for documents
more_features.description: With the {{ProdFullName}} API, users can generate, modify, search, validate, and remove different signature types, simplifying document workflows with precision.

feature_1.title: Apply multiple signature types
feature_1.content: {{ProdShortName}} allows the application of Text, Image, Barcode, QR Code, and Stamp signatures to any document. You can precisely place signatures on any page and manage metadata easily. Protect your documents from unauthorized changes with digital certificates.

feature_2.title: Search and validate signatures
feature_2.content: Verify document signatures for authenticity and accuracy using advanced validation tools. Easily get a detailed list of all signatures embedded in a document for better oversight.

feature_3.title: Modify existing signatures
feature_3.content: You can update previously applied signatures by adjusting content, position, color, size, and other attributes to suit your specific needs.

feature_4.title: Easily remove signatures
feature_4.content: Streamline document management by quickly removing unwanted signatures. Whether it’s a digital certificate or another signature type, removal can be done efficiently.

formats.title: Embed QR codes in various document formats
formats.description: Use the {{EnvName}} API to embed QR codes into any industry-standard document format. Store and encode important information into 2D barcodes for easy scanning and data retrieval.

operations.title: Explore our signature solutions
operations.description: We offer a wide variety of signature types and operations to meet your document needs.

examples.comment_1: Initialize a new {{TextSignature}} instance with the document
examples.comment_2: Use {{QrCodeSignOptions}} to embed a QR code into the document
examples.comment_3: Specify the signature type and set its position on the page
examples.comment_4: Save the document with the embedded QR code

steps.title: Steps to generate and insert a QR code in {{FileFormatUp}}

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) lets you create QR codes in popular formats and place them on {{FileFormatUp}} pages. With support for over 10 QR code types, you can seamlessly integrate this functionality into {{EnvName}} applications. Enhance your documents with QR code signatures using our product.
content.step_1: Obtain the {{FileFormatUp}} file or stream where the QR code will be added.
content.step_3: Customize visual settings like color, position, and size.
content.step_4: Save the document with the embedded QR code.

code_1.title: Customize a Generated QR Code
code_1.content: This example shows how to place a customized QR code on a {{FileFormatUp}} page.
code_1.comment_1: Get the document to be signed and pass it to {{TextSignature}}
code_1.comment_2: Configure QR code options with the required text
code_1.comment_3: Set the QR code’s position on the page
code_1.comment_4: Set the padding for the signature
code_1.comment_5: Choose the color of the QR code
code_1.comment_6: Define the font options for the message
code_1.comment_7: Set the background color and brush for the QR code
code_1.comment_8: Embed the QR code into the document
